name: lance la lecture

search in mem
use memory
sommeil / attente
recharge son
nettoyage
func:
let line=msg.payload
let delete_0='<one-of>'
let delete_1='</one-of>'
let delete_2='rule id">'
let delete_3='<grammar version="1.0" xml:'
let delete_4='</grammar>'
let delete_5='<tag>out.action.'
let delete_6='</rule>'
let delete_7='<tag>out.action=new Object(); </tag>'
let delete_8="<item></item>"
let delete_9='<rule id=';
let delete_10=global.get('swan_name');

if(line.includes(delete_10) || line.includes(delete_9) ||line.includes(delete_8) ||line.includes(delete_7) || line.includes(delete_0) || line.includes(delete_1) || line.includes(delete_2) || line.includes(delete_3) || line.includes(delete_4) || line.includes(delete_5) || line.includes(delete_6))
{
}
else
{
    
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('<!--', '\n\n<!--')
    line=line.replace('<item>', '')
    line=line.replace('</item>', '')
    msg.payload="\t\t-"+line
    return msg 
}
